item.title: Need help with command
item.dc:creator: @k0ed_noob k0ed noob
item.description:
@k0ed_noob wrote:

umm if you wanna make a command list… then you need to do the following tihngs
first search for mainhelpmenu… or something like that then under that type

public void CommandMenu() { sendQuest("@dre@(Title here)", 8144); //Title clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("@dre@", 8147); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8148); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8149); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8150); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8151); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8152); sendQuest("@dre@", 8153); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8154); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8155); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8156); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8157); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8158); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8159); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8160); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8161); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8162); sendQuest("@dre@", 8163); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8164); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8165); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8166); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8167); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8168); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8169); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8170); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8171); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8172); sendQuest("@dre@", 8173); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8174); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8175); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8176); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8177); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8178); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8179); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8180); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8181); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8182); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8183); sendQuest("@dre@", 8184); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8185); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8186); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8187); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8188); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8189); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8190); sendQuest("@dre@", 8191); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8192); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8193); sendQuest("@dbl@", 8194); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

ok now after that go add this

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”))
{

	CommandMenu();
}[/code]

right under this

[code]else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“mainmenu”))
{

		MainHelpMenu();
	}[/code]

hope that helps

Read full topic
